reviewText: This drama has Jang Keun Suk and Kim Jae Wook in it, that would have been enough but it is a cute storyline, cleverly written and directed well. The songs are amazing and this drama has it all. I actually cheered out loud while watching this because it was so fun to watch. It does have some slow bits, but they are few and far outweighed by the beauty of the actors. I cant say anything about the dvd set though. I watch Korean dramas through Drama Fever app.
This is my favorite Jang Keun Suk Korean Comedy/Drama aside from "You're Beautiful."

This k drama is in our top 3. It doesn't get any better than this. Beautiful cast. Great story. Laugh cry laugh some more. Loved the music. Good ending. if your k drama fan don't miss this one. OH WE ALL LOVED IT.
Loved this k drama!! Awesome acting! Great subs!! Attractive men!! Who could ask for more?

It kept my interest. Most of the actors did well. I thought that the actor who played Mary's dad, was a ridiculous character. Some of the dialogue for his part seemed retarded. It is hard to understand Mary's lack of backbone. The ending left unanswered questions.
